TopicTitle: Issue Completing Attach Battery To Satellite Mission

Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

I can't complete my mission to attach a battery to a satellite in orbit. I get the battery from the cargo hold and fix it in place on to the craft. However, it doesn't recognise that I have done what the mission asks which is frustrating. The link shows it attached and the mission not complete. Any solutions?  

 

https://imgur.com/a/DdRsNP8
Yup I've got exactly the same problem, thanks for posting. Screenshot. Am playing the game vanilla without any DLC

Looks like you are experiencing the same issues as I have. You can read more about it Here and here for a work-around that will get you through (if you don't mind editing your save file). Otherwise, if you're satisfied you have finished the contract then use the "alt-f12" menu to cheat-complete it.
I think I found my bug. It says the vessel has an ID of 0 which cannot be true.

I just cheat-completed it because I spent like 5 hours and multiple launches.  Added docking ports. Tried to attach with stock 1.12.3 orbital attach.  Tried to attach it with KAS.  I could added a god damn docking port with both methods but it would not let me attach the damn battery!!!   So after 5 hours and several complete launches and enough frustration that I was ready to get a crowbar and beat my $4000 computer into a pile of plastic and silicon, I just cheated it and took a break for a day or two from Ksp hell.
